channel.description: Welcome to CIS 527 Enterprise Systems Administration Welcome to CC 510 Computer Systems Administration Russell Feldhausen Pronouns: he/him (785) 292-3121 (Call/Text) 2213 Engineering Hall (working remotely) russfeld AT ksu DOT edu https://russfeld.me - @russfeld Email & Discord Preferred Teaching Assistant Matt Schwartz - matt00 AT ksu DOT edu Communication Discord - Course Questions, Discussions, etc Email - Personal Issues, Grading Questions, To-dos, etc cis527-help@ksuemailprod.onmicrosoft.com Email is official, Discord is more flexible Content Credits Seth Galitzer - sgsax AT ksu DOT edu
